/*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 개체 이름 : HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_SPC_ALARM
-- 만든 날짜 : 2013-06-12 오후 5:12:20
-- 마지막으로 수정한 날짜 : 2013-06-12 오후 6:20:49
-- 상태 : VALID
------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
DROP TABLE HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_SPC_ALARM CASCADE CONSTRAINTS;

CREATE TABLE HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_SPC_ALARM (
  ID            VARCHAR2(64)     NOT NULL, 
  DOMAIN_ID     VARCHAR2(64)         NULL, 
  PRD_DATE      VARCHAR2(8)          NULL, 
  SEQ           NUMBER(38)           NULL, 
  ROUTING       VARCHAR2(5)          NULL, 
  ST_NO         VARCHAR2(5)          NULL, 
  P_CODE        VARCHAR2(3)          NULL, 
  ITEM_NO       VARCHAR2(20)         NULL, 
  ALARM_TYPE    VARCHAR2(10)         NULL, 
  VAL1          FLOAT(22)       DEFAULT 0.0            NULL, 
  VAL2          FLOAT(22)       DEFAULT 0.0            NULL, 
  VAL3          FLOAT(22)       DEFAULT 0.0            NULL, 
  VAL4          FLOAT(22)       DEFAULT 0.0            NULL, 
  VAL5          FLOAT(22)       DEFAULT 0.0            NULL, 
  ACTDTTM       VARCHAR2(30)         NULL
)
TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT
PCTFREE 10
PCTUSED 0
INITRANS 1
MAXTRANS 255
STORAGE (
    INITIAL 64 K
    NEXT 1024 K
    MINEXTENTS 1
    MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
)
LOGGING
NOCACHE
MONITORING
NOPARALLEL
;

/*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 개체 이름 : HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_SPC_ALM_0
-- 만든 날짜 : 2013-06-12 오후 5:12:20
-- 마지막으로 수정한 날짜 : 2013-06-12 오후 5:12:20
-- 상태 : VALID
------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
DROP INDEX HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_SPC_ALM_0;

CREATE INDEX HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_SPC_ALM_0
ON HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_SPC_ALARM (PRD_DATE)
PCTFREE 10
INITRANS 2
MAXTRANS 255
STORAGE (
    INITIAL 64 K
    NEXT 1024 K
    MINEXTENTS 1
    MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
    PCTINCREASE 0
)
TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT
LOGGING
NOPARALLEL;

/*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 개체 이름 : HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_SPC_ALM_1
-- 만든 날짜 : 2013-06-12 오후 5:12:20

-- 상태 : VALID

DROP INDEX HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_SPC_ALM_1;

CREATE INDEX HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_SPC_ALM_1
ON HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_SPC_ALARM (PRD_DATE, ROUTING)
PCTFREE 10
INITRANS 2
MAXTRANS 255
STORAGE (
    INITIAL 64 K
    NEXT 1024 K
    MINEXTENTS 1
    MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
    PCTINCREASE 0
)
TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT
LOGGING
NOPARALLEL;

/*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 개체 이름 : HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_SPC_ALM_2
-- 만든 날짜 : 2013-06-12 오후 5:12:20

DROP INDEX HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_SPC_ALM_2;

CREATE INDEX HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_SPC_ALM_2
ON HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_SPC_ALARM (PRD_DATE, ROUTING, ST_NO)
PCTFREE 10
INITRANS 2
MAXTRANS 255
STORAGE (
    INITIAL 64 K
    NEXT 1024 K
    MINEXTENTS 1
    MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
    PCTINCREASE 0
)
TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT
LOGGING
NOPARALLEL;

/*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 개체 이름 : HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_SPC_ALM_3
-- 만든 날짜 : 2013-06-12 오후 5:12:21
-- 마지막으로 수정한 날짜 : 2013-06-12 오후 5:12:21
-- 상태 : VALID
------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
DROP INDEX HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_SPC_ALM_3;

CREATE INDEX HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_SPC_ALM_3
ON HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_SPC_ALARM (PRD_DATE, ROUTING, ST_NO, ITEM_NO)
PCTFREE 10
INITRANS 2
MAXTRANS 255
STORAGE (
    INITIAL 64 K
    NEXT 1024 K
    MINEXTENTS 1
    MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
    PCTINCREASE 0
)
TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT
LOGGING
NOPARALLEL;

ALTER TABLE HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_SPC_ALARM ADD
(
    PRIMARY KEY ( ID )
        USING INDEX
        TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT 
        PCTFREE 10
        INITRANS 2
        MAXTRANS 255
        STORAGE (
            INITIAL 64 K
            NEXT 1024 K
            MINEXTENTS 1
            MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
        )
);
